titleStmt.title: John S. Jones to John Seaton
CWG7752

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
Greenup County Court
September Term 1862
Present
Hon. John Seaton
Presiding Judge

John E. Winn late a Justice of the Peace of this County in District No 1 having tendered his written resignation of Said Office This Court doth recommend, to His Excellency James F Robinson Acting Governor of Kentucky, Benjamin F. Pratt as a Suitable person to be appointed by His Excellency to fill the Vacancy occassioned by said resignation

A Copy
Attest John S. Jones
Clerk Greenup Co. Court

We the undersigned citizens of Greenup County ^in said district^ unite in the recommendation, to his Excellency James F. Robinson acting Governor of Kentucky, of Benjamin F. Pratt Esqr as a suitable person to be appointed Justice of the Peace in District No. 1 of this County and we respectfully petition his Excellency to make said appointment

John S. Jones
Saml. Ellis
Geo Swap
James Y Pugh
Alex Smith
Jno E. Brooks.
C. L. Hertel
Geo W Chilliron
M. Morris
A D, DeBord
Ed F Dulin
W. C. Ireland --

Greenup Co.
J. P.
Dist. No 1.
B. F. Pratt
vice
J. E. Winn
Comn Issd Sept 15 1862
